name: aoyama
description: A typlog theme that mimics magazine. It provides extra exposure for your featured articles/episodes and is best suited for showcasing posts with covers.
author: Jessie Ji
readme:
typlog-aoyama

Theme Aoyama

A typlog theme that mimics magazine. It provides extra exposure for your featured articles/episodes and is best suited for showcasing posts with covers.

Author

Jessie Ji(https://jessieji.com) from the Typlog dev team
